alert.note: Alert for Atkinson; Clinch; Coffee; Jeff Davis (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 10 at 11:13AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT COFFEE...ATKINSON...NORTHWESTERN CLINCH AND SOUTHWESTERN JEFF DAVIS COUNTIES THROUGH 1215 PM EST... At 1113 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from 6 miles east of Lenox to near Ray City to near I-75 At Exit 16. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Douglas, Pearson, Willacoochee, Broxton, Ambrose, Nicholls, Pridgen, Cogdell, West Green, and Snipesville. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Jacksonville.
